authScene.claimText: This Stump server is not intialized. Use the form below to create your account. Once created, you will have full access to all server features.

libraryConfiguration.heading: Library Configuration
libraryConfiguration.subtitleCreating: A preview of your new library will be shown below
libraryConfiguration.subtitleEditing: A preview of your library edits will be shown below

createBookClubScene.heading: Create a new book club
createBookClubScene.subtitle: You can create a private book club a select few, or make it public for anyone on the server to join

name.label: Name
name.description: The name of your book club

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: An 'Our Flag Means Death' fan club. We read pirate fiction to our hearts content
description.description: An optional, short description of your book club

is_private.label: Private club
is_private.description: If enabled, only users you invite will be able to join your book club

member_role_spec.heading: Custom role mapping
subtitle: You can create custom names for the roles in your book club. For example, you could rename the 'Member' role to 'Crewmate', or 'Creator' to 'Captain'. If you don't want to use custom names, you can leave these fields blank and the default names will be used instead. For more information about roles, refer to the
documentation

member.label: Member
member.description: The name of the default role for your book club

moderator.label: Moderator
moderator.description: The name of the moderator role for your book club

admin.label: Admin
admin.description: The name of the admin role for your book club

creator.label: Creator
creator.description: The name of the creator role for your book club. This is you!

creator_preferences.heading: Your membership preferences
creator_preferences.subtitle: Some preferences for your membership in the book club. These can be changed at any time from the book club settings page

creator_display_name.label: Display Name
creator_display_name.description: An optional display name for your membership in the book club. If set, this takes precedence over your username

creator_hide_progress.label: Hide Progress
creator_hide_progress.description: If enabled, your read progress will be hidden from other members of the book club

createLibraryScene.heading: Create New Library
createLibraryScene.subtitle: Libraries are used to group your books together. If you're wanting a refresh on libraries and how they work, check out the

labels.libraryPathDescription: The path to the library as it exists on your server

librarySettingsScene.heading: Manage Library
librarySettingsScene.subtitle: Update the details or configuration of your library, change control access rules, or scan files. If you're wanting a refresh on libraries and how they work, check out the

labels.libraryPathDescription: The path to the library as it exists on your server

emptyState.heading: No books to display
emptyState.message: Any books you're currently reading will show up here

emptyState.heading: No series to display
emptyState.message: Any series you add to your libraries will show up here

emptyState.heading: No books to display
emptyState.message: Any books you add to your libraries will show up here

userSmartListsScene.heading: Smart lists
userSmartListsScene.subtitle: Your favorite searches and filters saved for easy access

emptyState.heading: No smart lists to display
emptyState.noListsMessage: Create a smart list to get started

layout.missingIdError: This scene requires an ID in the URL

filterDrawer.heading: Smart list filters
filterDrawer.description: Change the filters for this viewing session

rawData.heading: Raw filter data
rawData.description: This is how Stump will process the filters

description.create: Create a new view for this smart list

name.label: Name
name.description: A friendly name to uniquely identify this view

name.label: Name
name.description: The updated name for this view, if desired

errors.updateFailed: A server error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again.

avatarPicker.heading: Set your Avatar Image
avatarPicker.subtitle: Stump supports custom avatars, which can be set by providing a URL to an image. Image uploads are not supported in order to reduce the amount of data stored on the server.
avatarPicker.preview: A preview will appear here once you have entered a URL.

locale.heading: Language and locale
subtitle: Stump supports multiple languages and locales, set your preferences below. Please consider helping improve the quality of
Stump's translations
if you're able to!

app/appearance.title: Appearance
app/appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application

themeSelect.label: Theme
themeSelect.description: By default, Stump has a light and dark theme
customTheme: If you're interested in creating your own custom theme, check out the

app/reader.title: Reader settings
app/reader.description: Default options for the Stump readers. These are bound to your current device only

imageBasedBooks.label: Image-based books
imageBasedBooks.description: Comic books, manga, and other image-based books

preloadAheadCount.label: Preload ahead count
preloadAheadCount.description: The number of pages to preload ahead of the current page

preloadBehindCount.label: Preload behind count
preloadBehindCount.description: The number of pages to preload behind the current page

app/desktop.title: Desktop settings
app/desktop.description: Settings related to the Stump desktop application

discordPresence.label: Discord Presence
discordPresence.description: Display your Stump activity in Discord using Discord Rich Presence

server/general.title: General settings
server/general.description: General settings related to your Stump server instance

updateAvailable.message: Your server is not up to date. Please update to the latest version!

serverInfo.title: Server information
serverInfo.description: Basic details about your Stump server instance

build.label: Build
build.description: Details about the version and build

server/logs.title: Logs
server/logs.description: The logs generated by your Stump server instance

persistedLogs.title: Persisted logs
persistedLogs.description: These logs have been manually persisted to the database, typically associated with a specific job or event

table.emptySubtitle: Your server is either very healthy or very unhealthy

liveLogs.title: Live logs feed
liveLogs.description: Streamed directly from your Stump server instance in real-time

server/jobs.title: Jobs
server/jobs.description: Background jobs that run on your Stump server instance

scheduling.title: Scheduling
scheduling.description: Some jobs can be configured to run on a schedule. Changes to this configuration will take effect after a server restart

history.title: History
history.description: A record of jobs that have been run on your Stump server instance

table.emptyHeading: There are no jobs to display
table.emptySubtitle: You can't have a job if you don't have a job
table.deleteAllMessage: Job history and statistics may be deleted from the database at any time. This action cannot be undone

server/users.title: Users
server/users.description: Manage the users on this server

createUser.title: Create user
createUser.description: Create a new user on this server

updateUser.title: Update user
updateUser.description: Update the details of this user

accessControl.heading: Access control and restrictions
subtitle: Configure any restrictions you want to apply to this user. For more information about access control, see the
documentation

ageRestriction.label: Age restriction
ageRestriction.description: Restricts the user from accessing content above the set age rating threshold

enforceUnset.label: Enforce on unset
enforceUnset.description: If enabled, users will be restricted from accessing content with no age rating available

tagRestriction.label: Tag restrictions
tagRestriction.description: Restricts the user from accessing content with the selected tags

permissions.heading: Permissions
subtitle: Select the permissions you want to grant to this user. For more information on what each permission does, see the
documentation

read.label: Access book club features
read.description: Allows the user to access book club features, including viewing and joining book clubs

create.label: Create book clubs
create.description: Allows the user to create new book clubs

explorer.label: File Explorer
explorer.description:
Allows the user to access the Library File Explorer.
Content restriction is not supported when this feature is granted

download.label: Download files
download.description: Allows the user to download files from the server

upload.label: Upload files
upload.description: Allows the user to upload files to the server

create.label: Create libraries
create.description:
Allows the user to create new libraries.
Includes permissions to edit and scan

scan.label: Scan libraries
scan.description: Allows the user to initiate scans for existing libraries

edit.label: Edit libraries
edit.description: Allows the user to edit basic details for existing libraries

manage.label: Manage libraries
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage advanced settings for existing libraries.
Includes permissions to edit and scan

delete.label: Delete libraries
delete.description:
Allows the user to delete existing libraries.
Includes permissions to edit, manage, and scan

manage.label: Manage server
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage the server.
Includes *many* other permissions

read.label: Read users
read.description: Allows the user to query other users on the server. This is required for some other features, e.g. excluding users from accessing a library

manage.label: Manage users
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage other users on the server.
Includes permissions to create and update

read.label: Access smart list feature
read.description: Allows the user to access smart lists features

validation.ageRestrictionTooLow: Age restriction cannot be less than 0

signOutModal.title: Sign out
signOutModal.message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

desktop.message:
A network error occurred that suggests your Stump server is currently unavailable. Please ensure that it is running and accessible from this device.
If your server URL has changed, you can update it using the form below

web.message: A network error occurred that suggests your Stump server is currently unavailable. Please ensure that it is running and accessible from this device

uploadImage.emptyState: A preview of your image will appear here
uploadImage.prompt: Drop image here or click to select

common.unimplemented: This functionality is not yet implemented! Check back later
common.limitedFunctionality: This is not yet fully implemented and is lacking some features. Check back later
